main: Tom was very excited. For his birthday, his parents gave him a new bicycle. It was blue with black wheels. Tom couldn’t wait to ride it. He put on his helmet and went outside. At first, he was a little nervous, but after a few minutes, he got used to it. He rode down the street, feeling the wind on his face. Tom decided to ride to the park. When he arrived, he saw his friends playing soccer. They waved at him and asked him to join. Tom smiled and said, “I’ll join after I ride for a little longer.” He enjoyed riding his bicycle for an hour before playing with his friends.
Q1: Q1What did Tom get for his birthday?
Q2: Q2How did Tom feel when he first rode his bicycle?
Q2B: B. He was nervous at first, but then felt better.
Q2C: C. He didn’t like it at all.
Q2D: D. He was scared and went home.
A2: B. He was nervous at first, but then felt better.
